alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson; Ottawa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Dickinson, eastern Ottawa and southwestern Clay Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 459 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Miltonvale to 6 miles southwest of Manchester to near Niles. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Chapman, Solomon, Enterprise, Bennington, Wells, Manchester, Longford, Oak Hill, Niles, Moonlight and Talmage. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
